data.title: Scrabble Words
data.solution:
tiles = input()

for i in range(5):
    # count wildcards separately
    wildcardcount = tiles.count('?')

    word = input()
    # difference takes into account the difference between the tiles letter count and word letter count
    # only add if there is insufficient letters in the tiles (i.e tiles count too low)
    difference = 0
    for each in set(word):
        difference += max(word.count(each) - tiles.count(each),0)

    # wildcards should make up for the shortfall in order to form the word successfully
    if difference <= wildcardcount:
        print("Yes")
    else:
        print("No")
data.statement:
You are playing a Scrabble game. 
Given the 7 tiles on your rack, output whether it is possible to form the given words purely from your tiles alone.

testCases.title: No repeated letters
testCases.testIn:
RSTLNEM
APPLE
BANANA
STEM
NETS
REST

testCases.title: Not enough letters

testCases.title: Validator 3
testCases.testIn:
HIJKLMN
HABITUAL
IDEALISM
IMAGINED
MILK
IMITATES

data.stubGenerator:
read TILES:string(7)
loop 5 read WORD:string(100) 
loop 5 write Yes/No
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> A string consisting of 7 letters, which indicate the letters on your rack. '{{?}}' indicates a wildcard letter which can be used for any letter.
<<Next 5 lines:>> Words which you are considering to form

All the letters are given in uppercase.
data.outputDescription: For each word, output {{Yes}} if you can form it and {{No}} if you cannot.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You are playing a Scrabble game.
Given the 7 tiles on your rack, output whether it is possible to form the given words purely from your tiles alone.
Input
Line 1: A string consisting of 7 letters, which indicate the letters on your rack. '?' indicates a wildcard letter which can be used for any letter.
Next 5 lines: Words which you are considering to form

All the letters are given in uppercase.
Output
For each word, output Yes if you can form it and No if you cannot.
Constraints
Example
Input
RSTLNEM
APPLE
BANANA
STEM
NETS
REST
Output
No
No
Yes
Yes
Yes
